"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This classic disco song is a powerful statement about resilience and overcoming adversity. It's a perfect song to remind us that no matter what life throws at us, we can always get through it.

"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This iconic rock song is about holding on to dreams and never giving up, even when things get tough. It's a great reminder to keep pushing forward and believing in yourself.

"I'm Still Standing" by Elton John - This song is about overcoming challenges and staying strong in the face of adversity. It's a great song to listen to when you need a boost of confidence and motivation.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This song is about standing up for yourself and not letting fear hold you back. It's a great anthem for anyone who wants to break free from self-doubt and embrace their inner strength.

"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - This upbeat and catchy song is all about finding joy and happiness in life, even when things are tough. It's a great reminder to focus on the positive and find happiness in the small things.
